title: 03/21/22 DPS Hour 2 Deshaun Watson & Tom Izzo
itunes:title: 03/21/22 DPS Hour 2 Deshaun Watson & Tom Izzo
description:
In Hour 2 the guys explain that the Cleveland Browns will be the ones actually paying for Deshaun Watson's civil suits. Tom Izzo also joins the show to talk NCAA and facing Coach K in his final season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
